message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, Alice.
I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile, Bob. Time is running out.
Alice, you're losing value fast. Take this before it's too late.
This is my final offer, Bob. I need the majority to agree to this deal.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still here. Time is on my side.
Bob, let's be realistic. I need to get something out of this deal. This is a compromise.
Compromise? You're running out of time, Alice. This is the best you'll get.
